website_summaries.verdict: This compact washing machine is a top-seller and is a good choice for a dorm room or small apartment.
pros: Offers a 15-minute wash cycle and five-minute spin cycle
cons: We wish the spin dryer were a bit more effective
Some pump and drain issues noted

customer_reviews.title: By far the Best purchase ever! Great investment
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase EVER! Been using it for the past 5 months, now. It not only saves me a lot of trips to the local laundromat, but it can handle dirty clothes (if really dirty from soil and working outdoor, you might want to soak them in a bucket of hot water to remove oil stains and avoid having too much dirt in the machine) and clean them properly. I also use it for sheets (full size), bath towels and all my clothing. I truly love it. Look no further and get this one if you are trying to find an alternative to a laundromat and a regular washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie G.

customer_reviews.title: Big things come in small packages!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS MACHINE! IT IS AWESOME! The capacity, wash quality, drying capabilities. Just everything is AWESOME! Buy it you won't be disappointed. I was skeptical at first and live in an apartment. It's compact and super efficient. As long as you understand that the cords are short so it needs to be close to electrical outlet, water, and drainage (ie:toilet, sink, tub) you will be fine. No surprises. The dryer has a small surface space so dry in sections. Don't overload. That's it. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: TWeks

customer_reviews.title: Is not automatic
customer_reviews.text: It's great I guess. I didn't know the thing has to be babysat, probably wouldn't have bought it if I knew that. You have to stand there and watch to make sure it doesn't overflow when you're filling it up for the wash and again for the rinse, and you have to stand there as it drains because it does none of this automatically. It does not say this in the product description. How hard would it have been to add this to the description? Other than that it works well, not noisy, and the spin mode works great if you can get it balanced correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Michael

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to get a response after buying this washer. It does not work. I need a replacement or my money returned. I am disappointed of my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Dunning

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this little washer!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a tiny home and while looking for a small traditional unit came upon the portable washer/spin dryers. I chose Della because of the great reviews and after watching the videos. It arrived a day early. Amazing for a holiday weekend!! It's wonderful! My clothes , towels, even queen sheets, have never looked cleaner. This is a powerful little machine! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Noble

customer_reviews.title: What good is it without the spin dryer
customer_reviews.text: The dryer didn't work at all. What good is it without the spin dryer? Very dissatisfied. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Byers

customer_reviews.title: Spinner died and the pump was always problematic
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 uses, the pump started to have problems, then recently, the spinner stopped working. When we contact the seller (third party), they asked us to send the washer to them to have a look and we have to pay for the transport. Extremely disappointed on the product as well as the seller. I do not recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ranganath CJ

customer_reviews.title: has the possibility of leaking
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but when I use the spin cycle for the “dryer” most of the water leaks out the bottom, even when it is set to drain. There must be a leak but I can’t find it so I usually put a towel down underneath to catch the water. Not ideal but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken before I could even use it
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and was super excited about it. Then tonight I took the product out of the box and was about to start filling it up with water when I noticed a pretty big hole in the bottom of the machine. I'm incredibly disappointed that I'm having to return the product before I'm able to even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought new washer and received a dirty used one
customer_reviews.text: Update: Washing portion works great. Although it doesn't seem that the lint catcher actually catches anything. The spin dryer can't take a lot or long period of use. After about 10 uses it stops working, but does work again after a rest/break from use. A brand new machine might not have these issues. I can't say given my machine had been previously used. After prompt communication with the seller I have received a partial refund. It is mainly due to their prompt response; Acceptance of wrong and willingness to either do a partial refund or replace the item (i.e., great customer service); and machine working that I increased my rating from a 2 to a 4.
customer_reviews.author: LaTanya Carr

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how much I LOVE this washing machine!! My husband and I live in an apartment and were paying $4 per load before we decided to give this a try. I will never go back. This little wonder is a powerhouse. I can put at least a dozen shirts (probably more) in at a time before it starts slowing down. The biggest pain is filling it with water because the hose was too short and too thin for me. That's okay though because the pros definitely outweigh the cons of this little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan and Josephine H.

customer_reviews.title: Saves a Trip to the Laundromat
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for items like school uniforms or undershirts. It can’t really handle heavy items. Also don’t put delicates in here. They will tear or stretch out. The clothes sort of just spin in a ball in both directions so I often have to stand by with a detached broom stick to help move the clothes around to wash evenly. I’d prefer to have a normal washer and dryer but can’t in my building so this is better than walking four blocks in whatever weather. Ive had this washer for almost a year and the only thing I’ve encountered is a sock getting stuck in the drain pipe. Not easily fixed but with some elbow grease found a way.
customer_reviews.author: Geanette Nicole

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who lives in NYC... it’s a pain lugging your laundry to the laundromat especially in the winter. Watched some you tube videos on different ways to use and he found his niche. Bought the accordion style clothes hanger for drying. Has had since December 2018 and he still loves it!! Best $100 I could have spent.
customer_reviews.author: Lilylulu2

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed, with the results and how the reviews really ...
customer_reviews.text: I found all to be working properly and efficiently to my belief! I was amazed, with the results and how the reviews really influenced my decision to purchase this reliable, relevant product! It was fast arriving within days of my initial order and came without any damages! I used it and found the results to be satisfying and innovative! I would definitely recommend this product for anyone needing to save time and money from the laundromat or other laundry rooms!!
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Buy at you own discretion... Leaking while spinning because it came damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: Living in a city, the most dreaded thinug for me is going to the laundromat... I wanted a bargain for a washer... So I went with this. Got it in 2 days, exicted, filled it with water, plugged it, and began washing, it worked fine, then time to spin dry...water was everywhere in our restroom. I ended up having to stop and clean the floor for each spin... For $100 and the convinence of doing laundry at home it is good, but the leaking takes it down a bunch to only 2 stars... Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Zahra A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rv or home!
customer_reviews.text: Got this when a certain repair company took over a month to fix my washer. Had been meaning to get one for the rv anyway. Love it. Slightly more labor intensive than a fully automatic washer, but what a time and energy saver. Does smaller loads, but really plenty. The spinner holds about 1/2 the washer load, or less for really heavy stuff like towels. Spins more water out than my regular washer, totally suitable for the rv. In the back yard I just let the wash and rinse water drain out into the garden bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because I don't have a washer and dryer in my apartment. I dislike going to the laundromat and don't want to pay to use the machines in the basement. I have had it for a week and am completely satisfied so far. I do a couple loads every other day and I have had nothing but a positive experience. It's quiet, quick and easy to use. It also does a fantastic job of cleaning my clothes. I put filthy, greasy and oily uniforms from my factory job into the machine and they come out clean. I highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Antistatist

customer_reviews.title: Wow is all I can say - from an apartment with no water hookup
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I moved into an older apartment in Chicago with no water hookup for a washer. So we decided to look for a portable washer, and decided to try this one. Before, we had tried washing things in the bath and then hang drying them. No good! Our busy lives just couldn't accommodate the time. This machine saves us so much time when paired with our new portable dryer. The washer isn't as big as a normal washer, but it will wash all of our family's laundry (2 adults, 1 child) relatively quickly and conveniently since we don't have to travel up or down any stairs--it's right in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kern

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for people with little space, saves money and resources, should have bought one a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this washer. Wish we would have bought it years ago. The only thing is that the way the top is designed, the water drips out a bit down the sides during washes. Could use a gasket or just a slight change in the design of the cover. Other than that this thing does wonders!!! Clothes usually dry anywhere from a few minutes to an hour unless it’s bedding. With a tiny apartment, this thing is a godsend and I’m kicking myself for not purchasing one sooner! We spend $20 at the laundromat every time we go so this thing pays for itself in a few months in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Megpie

customer_reviews.title: my little game changer
customer_reviews.text: this little machine is my new favorite thing. i live in a third floor apartment so this is a game changer! super easy to use. the water tube they enclosed to bring water into the drum from faucet is really the only disappointment but i use a small bucket. works much better and so much faster. i love her so much. the price is great and i received it early. so far so good. i don't dread doing laundry now. spin dryer works great and really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Put a cup of water in the spinning side to check for any leakage first.
customer_reviews.text: The first machine had a leakage problem but the manufacturer replaced it. I just received the new one and it seems o.k.so far. I like the washer good enough, though! Great for my motor home. Fits in the bathroom just fine. I just put the drain hose in the shower and hook up the water line to the faucet. I have a spray nozzle and I unscrew the spray part and the hose line fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: doug owen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm upset about is that I didn't purchase this item sooner. It is one of my favorite appliances. My apartment is pretty small and it fits perfectly. This washing machine It has more than paid for itself. You do have to do smaller loads, but it washes everything wonderfully! I ended up purchasing a handheld spray shower head that fits on any faucet since the included hose didn't fit. It worked out perfectly. No more trips to the laundromat!
customer_reviews.author: Louise C.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We hit the road in an RV and I was hoping this machine would minimize our trips to the laundry. ABSOLUTELY AWESOME!. I fill it and empty it using a 5 gallon water jug I purchased from Walmart. I've found that using minimal detergent minimizes the soap foam and oxy clean deepens the clean and adds a freshness that also makes the rig smell great.. I also run the larger items through the ringer before rinsing to spin out the suds. Usually takes 2 to 3 loads in the "dryer" but it's well worth it. I'd recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra  K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great seller great washer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine...works really great. Exceeded my expectations. Had to contact seller with minor issue..they got back to me within hours and made sure I was happy. Great customer care and an awesome washer. Would recommend to family and friends..Noone should have to use a lauromat with a machine like this available.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whalen

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised and does a good job Why I gave 3 stars? The hoses and plug are too short and it tends to be quite frustrating. For something that cost almost half the price of a real washing machine it could have at least came with better hoses. In order to make this funtional for me I had to extend the length of the drain hose by attaching the fill hose to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Gets the soap residue out better than standard machines.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple loads to get the hang of it. Clothes have to move freely in the bin if they don't add more water or take some cloths out this will make the motor last. Spins clothes nearly dry. I fill it from my sink as well as the shower hose fills twice as fast and then some. I spin the clothes then rinse and continue to do that until the water runs clear. Cleaned microfiber clothes, that I use to wipe my car with, better than a standard washer. It's fun to use and so convenient; I figure it has saved me 20 dollars so far, at this rate it pay for itself in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Damn Yankee

customer_reviews.title: small size packed with great power
customer_reviews.text: love this a great easy to use washer thats never in the way. the reason i gave this item 3 stars is because the hose are not long enough and i feel that the pump does not push all the water out. other than that as a washer is does a great job i wish i can wash and dry on one side but at that point i would be asking for a full size washer. like i said very easy to use and always out of sight when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: N.A.

customer_reviews.title: a lot of power in this little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the power of this little, relatively inexpensive, machine. The spin cycle is very strong and does a great job of getting the majority of the water out of your clothes. Also, you can fit a lot more in both the washer and spin dryer than it first appears. The only thing i don't like is that the hose doesn't fit over either of my faucets. It's pretty narrow and I can't imagine it fits over anyone's faucets here in the US. Otherwise, this is a GREAT little machine for those of us that don't want to deal with apartment laundry rooms or laundromats.
customer_reviews.author: kempty

customer_reviews.title: Works well, auto drain pump is a dream!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Packaged well and arrived on time. I have washed 2 loads so far and am very pleased with the results. I had to rinse the first load a few times because I added a bit too much detergent, but the second load only twice. The spin dryer works really well. Once hung, most of my garments were dry after just a few hours. It fit to my bathroom sink which made washing super easy. The automatic drain pump works like a dream. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: phampon

customer_reviews.title: This lil dude is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received on time. Installed in my camp, perfect size.This little guy works amazing!! It is straight out of China, good luck following the directions in broken English, however you can get the just of what they are saying. So far so good!! I hope it lasts. Going to purchase a second one for my RV. Some of the reviews state they had problems shortly after purchasing others state the unit works flawlessly, so far as mentioned mine is great, I will be purchasing the three year protection plan just as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been living my life wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first load, and this is hands down the best purchase I’ve made for my small studio apartment. Yes it is a bit chunky, and takes more space than I expected. But it’s height allows to hide it under my clothes rack, so it’s worth the drawback. Like many other reviewers mentioned, it isn’t noisy. Washes really well. And I’m absolutely impressed with the spinning capabilities, which is something that honestly I didn’t have much faith in when ordering, by my clothes are half dry. Very happy with this purchase. Will update my review if I encounter any issues, but I’m a satisfied customer right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: StephReis

customer_reviews.title: I can't be more happy...it came 10 days early...!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you...Thank you...Thank you. My old portable washing machine was broken ...and I ordered this one....I am so happy I received today....it was supposed to be delivered between January 2 and January 7....but I received today, December 29th....and I am soooooo happy....I used already...it is really good....thanks...excellent customer service...excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: we’ve been using this washer to clean our cloth diaper for five months and it’s done an excellent job! they’re even cleaner than when i take them to the laundromat. it’s really ogs well and the spinner makes them almost dry when they come out. i tried this ok some of our clothes and the only thing that wasn’t good was t-shirt’s in the spinner. heeelllaaa wrinkled. it’s fine if you iron anyways. but we vowed to not do that again. but otherwise we love this washer!
customer_reviews.author: S. l.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans as well as a full size machine and only uses a quarter of the soap.
customer_reviews.text: Done six loads so far and I amazed at how good this machine works. The agitator works just as well as a big machine and it has a good size tub. The spin tub can dry a large load in 3 loads and really gets the water out well. My clothes have gotten cleaner in this machine than the big commercial washers at the laundromat and I'm only using a quarter of the soap I used to. All I need is one of those mini electric dryers for around $200 by winter and I'll only go to the laundromat to do big blankets from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE AMAZING PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it! Works so well for my apartment. I bought the 3 year warranty just in case. UPDATE: i still love it but i was worried about the draining hose not draining all of the water out after each load so i built a stand 17in wide, 15in tall, and 23.5in long. now that the washer is as tall as my bathtub, it drains perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 𝒦𝑒𝓁𝓈𝑒𝒶  ℋ𝒶𝓇𝓌𝑜𝑜𝒹

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RV WASHING MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great washer for our RV. It is lightweight and does a very good job cleaning the clothes. The high speed spin means that clothes need very little drying time on a rack. We have run about fifty loads through and it works well and reliably. Use HE detergent and fabric softener to reduce sudsing. It requires very little detergent for the clothes to come out clean. The only thing that could be improved is the length of the filler hose that comes with the machine, and that is easily extended by a trip to a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: LIBERTY

customer_reviews.title: Very useful little thing :)
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how light or heavy it is since I wasn’t the one who had it installed and I’ve had it for a few weeks so I would still have to give it some months to figure out regarding it’s durability. It is very easy to use, pretty self explanatory stuff. It holds up to about 13 lbs of a load. I wouldn’t recommend using too much detergent when using this product since it causes colors to run. All in all it’s a very cute and useful washer. I literally can’t go without it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Washer and dryer functions are good but the drain knob fell off
customer_reviews.text: Its does a descent job of washing moderate loads (including couple of jeans). Drying is ok. You will have to spread them afterwards on a rack as expected. I placed it on 3 foot high table and let it drain in the bath tub so draining doesnt seem to be a problem. Not sure of the speed if placed on floor and trying to drain in tub. 2 Star is because of the quality of the knobs. They are very tight and takes quite a bit of effort to turn them especially the drain knob. they are very flimsy and mine broke after few uses (within a month)
customer_reviews.author: Devdutt Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washer , great for small apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing machine, fits under a low counter or tucked away in a large closet. Washes clothes excellent, spin dryer leaves clothes practically dry you only need to hang dry for a an hour or 2 , Light iron is needed for some clothing items. I only wish the intake hose and drainage hose were better quality, but works well. Pump to empty water is great no need to elevate the machine to drain. Load capacity is small but perfect for a single guy. Gym clothes are always clean because of this machine !
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: We bought for our travel trailer / camper.  This saves us from going to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our travel trailer / camper. This saves us from going to the laundromat. Works well. Spinner really gets things dry enough that the dry on the line or dryer rack in a couple of hours. Warning, do not buy something else that does not have a spinner. A washer without a spinner is useless.
customer_reviews.author: From Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for small space living!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I could write a sonnet about this washer. I don't have to fight the old ladies at the apt laundry or get hit on at the local wash and tan. I'm saving about $20 a week paying for laundry so it paid for itself in less than a month! I keep it in the tub in my studio apartment and fill it with my detachable shower head. It's a very minor inconvenience to lift it out when I shower but the pros heavily out weigh the cons!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! The only thing I didn’t like was having ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The only thing I didn’t like was having to ring out the clothes to put into the spin dry- made for a lot of extra work. Best for small items that are easy to ring out. Fit a lot of clothes tho! What I would normally do in 2 loads- I did in 3 so I thought that was pretty good. Consider purchasing some kind of hang dry rack because if you do a lot of laundry this way, it’s hard to hang everything!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, it washes super clean, and the spin try is powerful. I have been using for 2 weeks and this machine is bomb! I use to drag big bags of clothes up and down the stairs. Now I just wash in 20 minutes.. it is super easy to work, and not too heavy to lift. Best decision ever! I just use a bucket to fill it... if you have a shower head that can move, filling this machine should be no problem. The only thing is that it makes a loud noise when it is spinning. But its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruschell goulding

customer_reviews.title: Use with care - great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great machine and it has reliably gotten me through some interesting times without ordinary washing machine access! It is made out of plastic, though, so you really do have to pay close and devoted attention to the many tips and recommendations for use (in the manual and in these reviews). I suspect that many negative reviews come from people who weren't careful with using it. So, take care of it, and it will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: and hate going into town and washing clothes and wasting most ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I live off the grid,and hate going into town and washing clothes and wasting most of a day at the laundry place. I saw this little gem and thought I'd give it a try. I love it. I use a generator for power and pour water in the little washer. The spin/dry side is small, but a 2-minute gets clothes wrung out so as only a little bit of time on the line and their dry. Great little washer and gets clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My spin dryer is broke after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 loads of boxers, socks and light weight (hotel style) towels and rags the spin dryer is making a loud thudder and takes minutes to get it's spin going. I love the machine and it came in less than 48 hours, I can't have anything full size where I stay so it's perfect for me, Amazon only offers me a refund but I want another one ASAP. Sending it back and then waiting for my money to return to my card and then ordering another one could take weeks.. I'm kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: austin wright

customer_reviews.title: Suprise suprise
customer_reviews.text: Impressive is all I can say. It is a big of work but if youre like me and live alone and or have a very small space. (Tiny Studio) This does the trick. I didn't even need the instructions it was so clear and my clothes were practically dry before I even put it in my mini dryer.
customer_reviews.author: J.Smiley

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months still working great
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this washer 6 months ago for my camper trailer and been using at home too. Performance is excellent. To simplify the way i add the water i share here rhe pic of what i did, a little mc giver thing lol. Anyway i was very concern with the plastic hoses that came with the washer and using outside hose and bucket ain't helping now with this hookup no worries about electric panel or buttons getting wet. I am a happy camper .
customer_reviews.author: Martlady

customer_reviews.title: This product is worth its weight in gold! IIt's ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth its weight in gold! IIt's inexpensive and washes well. It holds about 2 outfits or 3 pairs of blue jeans. I can wash throw blankets (but not large comforters). All of my weekly washing can be handled from the comforts of home!
customer_reviews.author: ZQ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine
customer_reviews.text: Been using mine for well over 3 years. Works like the first time used. The spinner is great, doesn't take anytime to dry on rack. My recent purchase was for a friend who wanted one, he was impressed with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: get the job done
customer_reviews.text: It's compact, which is perfect for my small bathroom. The tube came with it is not very sturdy. The tube for draining is a little short. It washed perfectly. I just wish that the washing timer could be longer. It's 15 minutes and I'm thinking that 20+ minutes would be a nice option to have. You may not want to use it for your delicates since it's not front loading, it's vertical, and the serrated thing at the bottom of the bucket could cause too much of friction to your delicates.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted exactly 10 months, and then just died, nothing new happened. Just wouldnt agitate the clothes anymore.
customer_reviews.author: 4th flamingo

customer_reviews.title: bought mine in January. Worked well al those months ...
customer_reviews.text: bought mine in January. Worked well al those months. Now it wont pump water out, so I guess its done
customer_reviews.author: Annjo Balbutin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small loads - Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Della washing machine. I had read reviews so had an idea of what to expect and how to use it. Perfect for my needs. I place the it in my bathtub for easy draining and use my hand-held shower head to fill it. (Just place inside the machine. Much, much easier). Remember 11 lbs is "wet weight", usually 2 pairs of slacks and a shirt...or a load of socks and under garments or 2 bath towels. I also wash sheets, pillowcases, etc. It takes a little exxtra effort but BEATS THE DAYLIGHT out of going to a coin laundry. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: loyaltn

customer_reviews.title: So upset about my washer not working after one week
customer_reviews.text: I received my washer on 11/29 and on 12/9 it was not working. I really loved the washer for the few days I had it. But this really updated me to found out it's not working anymore. Now I have to wait two day to see what the seller is going to no for me 😤😤
customer_reviews.author: Samina B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, saves on water and space
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a slightly more eco-friendly version of a washer and dryer. I live in the middle of the desert in a water-haul area, so this washer makes me much more aware of how much water I use, and with this, it's not much! Obviously, it does much smaller loads than an average washer/dryer, and it's a bit more work than just tossing your clothes in and forgetting about them, but I don't mind. It's very portable and easy to use, and it does get your clothes really clean. I would definitely recommend this washer/dryer, and I have, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Baurain

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit in April 2018. I was preparing for my husband and I to live full-time in our RV. We moved into our RV two months ago. I have used the washing machine for times. Today I go to use it and it will not agitate and the other side will not spin. It has power. I can hear it clicking. The drain works, but what good is that if I can’t wash and spin dry the clothes. Verydisappointed
customer_reviews.author: Orsunrose

customer_reviews.title: NOT for people with PETS.
customer_reviews.text: This thing does NOT work if you have cats or dogs with lots of pet hair. The dryer has zero heat and just spins your clothes for 15 minutes at a time. They will never be dry from the dryer you WILL need somewhere to hang and dry all of your clothes. Mine usually took 3 days to air dry or 2 with my fan blowing on them for 48+ hours. And the cat hair never comes off, just gets worse as you wear the clothes and wash em again.
customer_reviews.author: savannah treece

customer_reviews.title: Horrible washer!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: This washer worked once! Only once! It's a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Tod

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I got so tired of constantly hoarding ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got so tired of constantly hoarding quarters to do laundry, and this machine is pretty convenient. It works rather nicely, especially after developing a system for it.
customer_reviews.author: Iret

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great washer alternative for people who live in buildings without a washroom or hookups. Keeping clothing clean regularly helps keep them over time and frees up space from undone laundry. Very happy with this product. Plenty of YouTube videos are available to see how everything works and good tips like lint catchers.
customer_reviews.author: L W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect apartment accessory.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome set up and the spin dryer is top notch. You do need to rinse the items twice and the instructions included...let’s just say thanks to you tube or I might still be looking at the box.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Bella

customer_reviews.title: DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a dream! It hooks up perfectly to my bathroom sink, drains and SPINS all the water leaving clothes damp. I didn't experience the stiffness others did, I did experience quite a bit of lint on my first load. With a little bit of fabric softener and just turning clothes inside out the lint issue was fixed! I live in a major city in a 300 square foot apartment with no laundry in building so this machine is seriously the best purchase! (Fits perfectly in my closet)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big workhorse, small package
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse! Strong motor cleans better than I thought and completely empties/drains without having to have the unit off the floor. The spin dry section works great as the rest of the unit. The key to this machine is to make sure not to OVERLOAD it. To give you an idea, 3 loads from this machine would equal a large home washing machine, but being in an apt., the size it great, and I don't have to haul my clothes to a laundry room! And it DIDN'T make my energy bill jump either. Great for apt. dwellers, dorm rooms and campers. I love this 'lil guy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Doubledee

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk.  Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This washer does not get the clothes clean at all even soaking and using two cycles with two rinse cycles. It only spreads whatever dirt there is around throughout the load and stretches everything out. It will ruin your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Spinner is dead.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this... spinner stopped working after 2 loads. Going to contact seller hopefully they exchange.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Meeeeh
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to recieve this machine. It arrived quickly the package appeared to be in good shape. I opened it set it up and got to work. Found out the hard way that it had a madsive crack on the inside spin area. There was water EVERYWHERE! I was very disappointed that there was no exchange option only return and refund. I would not mind so much but I cannot fit it in my car with my kids and carseats. The broken brand new equipment and difficult return process really makes me think twice about purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Roodhouse

customer_reviews.title: So awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and I absolutely love it. The other reviewers have pretty much said it all, but I wanted to add that I've had zero issues with the lint sticking to clothing and I don't use a lint catcher. I would buy this again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kay

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've had it a bit over a month & would totally buy again. Live in an apt & have laundry facilities available but hey, lots of babies live here - I cringe at using the washers here ;) I have access to my parents w/d, it's just more convenient to have this right there & it does an amzing job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for apartment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months to write this review. It still works great. It gets clothes clean. The spinner dries the clothes so they are just damp. I can wash and spin dry a pair of jeans, then hang them up to dry and they will be completely dry the next day. I wouldn't recommend putting delicate clothing in this washer unless by itself and only a few minutes. The clothes spin fast and get tangled together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely over the moon!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!! I got this because im tired of having to go to the laundry mat . And having laundry like up because I can't seem to find time . Or needing one item of clothing and finding it in the dirty bin . I have the washer outside so I use my nose, and drain into a bin or my plants (with no soap) and then I hang my clothes on a line . It's simple and up front . I think . . You don't need much instruction to use .
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: All around amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!!!! It took 5 days to ship which I think is pretty fast! Nothing was broken, did 2 loads of laundry already and I am so impressed! The spinner was especially surprising i only spun my clothes once and they only felt damp! I have to say I was a little sad that the spinner is a little small but still worth it especially for how high quality. Beggers cant be choosers. If this ever breaks which I doubt but if it does I will but this product 1000 times over, it's so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: SummerBlunt

customer_reviews.title: Multiple damaged products
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend anymore. Their products used to work great then I ended up receiving a new damaged product recently, they issued a replacement and this product was also damaged. They DO NOT take the items back and WILL force you to dispose of them. Im disabled so I have 3 of their broken machines stuck in my little apartment now. Utter disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: It Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. its a hassle when the tube that comes with it doesn't connect to the sink at home so id have to use buckets of water for filling and the draining process since its based off gravity the washer does need to be elevated....the dryer part is not as big as the washer side so beware of what u wash. BUT for the size and price im please with what It can do.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Clarke

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my new portable washer
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my new portable washer. It works like doing a small load in a regular washer; and half that amount for the spin side of the washer. This machine has got some power to it. It washes clothes very well and you just need to use a small amount of soap. If you use too much soap you have to keep refilling water to rinse the soap out of your clothes. Its a little extra work, but totally worth it to have clean laundry and not have to go to the laundry mat. Just handle this machine with care and it should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: First off, it's super compact and extremely quiet. The motor in it is powerful and that really surprised me. Gets clothes nice and clean. This isn't a set it and forget it machine, but it's going to save us from spending our every Saturday at the laundry mat and the bonus is that it will pay itself off in less than three months. The fill and drain hoses are both WAY too short and that is why I docked one star from the rating. We are actually letting it drain into our toilet as that is the farthest it can reach. We can work with it and overall are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Balanoff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This little washer really has some power! The wash cycle is relatively short, I like to wash once with detergent then drain and refill with fabric softener. Then drain and spin. The spinner is amazing. It’s crazy how fast it goes. Would highly recommend. Doesnt fit too much at once but fills on 5 gallons or so. Works amazing in my apartment. Can do a weeks worth of laundry in two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is that my clothes will get tangled up every wash! The pump does a great job of sending water to the drain that's about 3.5 ft above the floor. Still need to use a bucket to get the last liter or so out of the machine though. Lint is on every square inch of my wardrobe now but I guess it's better than hand washing in the sink or spending $1000 on big washing machine. 3-3.5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It washes cleanly and spin-dries well. You get 3 basic functionalities to manually choose from - wash, drain, spin-dry. You do want to rinse multiple times to completely remove the dirty water after washing your clothes. Missing one star due to a crack on the plastic corner out of the box. Not sure if it's the shipping or the poor quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase again. Already failed.
customer_reviews.text: The washer machine pump has already failed after being purchased on February 28th. Not sure what to do at this point. I have emailed the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Broken right out of the box. The plastic doors were ripped off, plastic and metal pieces were sitting in both the wash and spinner basins. When I went to turn on the spin dryer, it made a loud noise and did nothing. Video shows details.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Shand

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I’ve made all year
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing every day. I love it. I keep it in my bathroom. I wish the hoses were a little longer and there was a better method of controlling lint. But overall an awesome product! The spinner is amazing my clothes are literally 95 percent dry and completely dry after maybe an hour after hanging.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: it stopped draining after maybe 4 months of use. there is no way to fix the plumbing as everything inside it is glued together. you get what you pay for i guess!
customer_reviews.author: alex garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good made washer
customer_reviews.text: This washer does a good job for about 6 months and then it’s stops working. I followed the Manufacturing instructions. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: John Dowtin

customer_reviews.title: Second try. Hope it lasts longer.
customer_reviews.text: Well, ordered the same machine last September based on reviews. Everyone is right in saying the directions are useless. Look up YouTube videos instead. The machine does clean the laundry nicely. I do have to fill it with a bucket, as the "fill hose" is a glorified straw that is useless. Then one day the machine didn't work. No clue why. Luckily I had gotten the assistant warranty, and once I filed the claim, got an e-card and was able to get another machine. Hope this one lasts. If not, I'll have to get a different one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Must have for apartments
customer_reviews.text: I use it probably 3x a week and it takes loads for a 3 person family like a champ. Living in an apartment, this has saved me so much money from having to do $2 loads of laundry every single time.
customer_reviews.author: lijpoikp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! Just moved to a town and the only laundromat is horrid. No hookups in my apartment. This little thing will pay for itself in a month. Sure it takes a couple steps (not just load and push a button) but does a great job. Add a drying rack with a fan and you have your own laundry center.
customer_reviews.author: Madcitymommy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: The washer in our washer-dryer stacked as one unit broke down and it got to be too much to do regular laundry loads by hand. This mini washer is brilliant! Light weight, compact, easy to use! Washes small loads well and the spinner really got the water out. We have a new washer and dryer, but still have the Mimi as back up and for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great compact washer with power assited drain.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, lightweight but powerful enough to do any job. At the time I didn't believe this compact washer had a motorized drain but to my surprised it did, it took me a few loads to figure out how best to use wash, rinse and fabric softeners but very easy. This product is quite, simple and study.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Galvan

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it if you’re not willing to spend a lot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this for about a month now. So far, I have been able to wash a great deal of my clothes VERY well. There is a strong plastic smell when initially using the machine. The pump lost power after about 10-15 uses but by keeping the machine above the drain, it’s able to drain completely. It’s a good bang for your buck considering it’s significantly cheaper than the ge products.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job very well. It is small but whoa! Powerful! I love it, I just got it last week and tried it a day after it was delivered. I hope it last even just for a year, so I would just had to remember February 2019! Then I will update you.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am using this portable machine for almost a month, it works great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sonia Arif

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need an adapter to connect to pull-down sink faucet. I could not find one.
customer_reviews.author: Aylin Tolu

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my little washer
customer_reviews.text: Such a great little washer. Came in supper handy while I was in the middle of getting a new washer. I am still using it for small loads. It has its inconveniences but nothing I can’t work with.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST INVESTMENTS
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great! I brought this due to washing newborn & toddler clothes & it is so much more convenient then running to the laundromat spending $3 & $4 on their clothes to dry; plus $2 & $3 for washing. Especially with a newborn because their little clothes seem to take forever to wash & dry. Spin cycle twice & clothes nearly come out dry
customer_reviews.author: Khaliah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken agitator
customer_reviews.text: One star for now because of the following issue, but hopeful that the company will respond. We began to use my new machine today and discovered that the washing side (larger side) has an agitator that doesn’t move. The motor appears to work because it shifts slightly in either direction but won’t rotate more than a few degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Good little washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Great for apartments or motor homes. Very economical. The only drawback appears to be the drain system. It requires gravity to assist in getting the drain pump to begin working. Once primed it will pump upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small loads of work uniforms when I don't have the time or willingness to go to the laundromat
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this portable washing machine!!! It works amazingly! I’ve had it for about a month now. The only thing I would say about it is I wish the water out pump would pump the water out better without having to lift the washer up to let the water out. It still pumps out pretty good but sometimes it just needs a bit of help.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! This washing machine has been a life saver. I live in an apartment with no laundry hookups. I enjoy doing my laundry now and it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Melz G

product_meta.title: Della Portable Mini Washing Machine (White) 11pounds Washer Capacity with Top Load Laundry Spin Dryer Combo

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars543 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
